data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Vakaga, Central African Republic today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vakaga, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Vakaga, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, move the 12,222 believers in the state of Vakaga to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Vakaga, Central African Republic to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Runga people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Vakaga who will make disciples who make disciples.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 12,222 believers in Vakaga, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 10,895, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
